title: Henley Top with Lace Hem & Flared Low-Waist Jeans
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a cute fitting Henley top with minimal lace frills along the hemline, dainty detailing, solid pastel color, paired with low-waisted flared jeans in dark blue denim. Plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, no model or mannequin.
garment_type: Henley top and flared jeans set
length: top: hip length, pants: full length
style_fit: top: slim fit, pants: relaxed flare

top.construction: double-stitched seams, lace hem attached with overlock stitch

provenance.inspiration: Soft feminine details paired with classic denim flare for a balanced casual-chic look.
